title: Harlequin KISS - May 2014 (Epub)
description:
Harlequin KISS May 2014 Epub)

Christy McKellen - Lessons in Rule-Breaking 

Journalist Jess has always followed the rules when it comes to her career:

1) Never say no! Trying to extract a tell-all interview from bad boy of the art world Xander Heaton might be her own worst nightmare, but she's just going to have to grin and bear it!

2) Absolutely no flirting on the jobÃ¢â‚¬â€professionalism is key to a journalist's success. Even if Xander does have her imagining the most unprofessional scenariosÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

3) If resistance proves impossible, remember the golden ruleÃ¢â‚¬â€never kiss and tell!

One night with Xander and she's broken at least one ruleÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and discovered it's much more fun breaking rules than making them!


Heidi Rice - Beach Bar Baby 

One hot vacation! 

After some bad news, Ella jets off to sunny Bermuda for a bit of solo R & RÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. 

By day six, surrounded by honeymooners and smug marrieds, she has to admit the solo bit is getting a teeny bit boring! Why say no to a casual date at the bar with ripped, tanned and enigmatic Cooper Delaney? 

It's really not Coop's style to flirt with tourists, let alone hook up with one again. But he can't get the sweet London girl out of his head. A business trip to Europe is the perfect chance to see her. Only he finds Ella curvier, prettierÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and keeping a secret he was so not expectingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦!


Jennifer Rae - Sex, Lies & Her Impossible Boss 

There's no such thing as 'just sex,' Cash." 

When the new boss of Faith Harris's TV station, the famously ruthless and annoyingly gorgeous Cash Anderson, tells her he'll be canceling her sex and relationships show she knows she's in for a fight. She's worked her silk-clad butt off to get her high ratings, and no man's going to take them away from herÃ¢â‚¬â€however hot under the collar he secretly gets herÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. 

But sugar's better than vinegar any day, so Faith decides to prove to Cash just how meaningful her show really is. The only trouble is, it's also ratherÃ¢â‚¬Â¦risquÃƒÂ©. And there was enough chemistry between them even before Faith set about proving just how riveting sex can beÃ¢â‚¬Â¦!


Shoma Narayanan - Twelve Hours of Temptation 

The best mistake of his life?

Being chained to her desk is not how copywriter Melissa D'Cruz envisaged spending the night before her first major awards ceremony. No Cinderella moment for this award nomineeÃ¢â‚¬â€instead she's facing a night of deadlines! But Melissa is determined to get to the eventÃ¢â‚¬Â¦she just has to work out howÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

New boss Samir Razdan catches Melissa burning the midnight oil and offers to drive her to the event himself. But the minute they set off Samir knows he's in troubleÃ¢â‚¬â€because being this close to Melissa is already driving him crazy, and they've got twelve torturous hours of temptation aheadÃ¢â‚¬Â¦!

Format: EPUB
